pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph-Based k-Sample Comparisons and Relevance Analysis in High Dimensions // We propose two distribution-free test statistics based on between-sample edge counts and measure the degree of relevance by standardized counts. Users can set edge costs in the graph to compare the parameters of the distributions. Methods for comparing distributions are as described in: Xiaoping Shi (2021) arXiv:2107.00728.
